errors.Username should be alphanumeric with atl: Username should be alphanumeric with atleast 5 characters
errors.Username should begin with alphabets and: Username should begin with alphabets and can be alphanumeric with atleast 5 characters
errors.Username should contain alphabets and at: Username should contain alphabets and atleast 6 characters
errors.Username should contain lower case alpha: Username should contain lower case alphabets and atleast 4 characters
